text: Faxanadu is one of my favorite NES games and I prefer it over other games it shares similarities with on the console, like Castlevania II and Zelda II. It's too bad it flew over most people's radar back then, which prevented it from being the start of possibly great franchise.
author: SupraDarky

text: Ooh, I'm gonna have to check this game out after this. It has really interesting music.
author: Kasran Fox

text: Kasran Fox a pretty good nes game. id prefer zelda 2 better, but this game is on par with zelda 2. definitely a hidden gem it seems because i only see people on the internet ever to have talked about this game.
author: Kr4v3rd

text: Well, Faxanadu is one of the several spin-offs of Dragon Slayer II: Xanadu. The latest spin-off, Tokyo Xanadu, released on the PSVita just last year I believe.
